tool.name: alevin-fry convert
tool.help:
alevin-fry-convert 0.5.1 Avi Srivastava <avi.srivastava@nyu.edu> Hirak Sarkar <hirak_sarkar@hms.harvard.edu> Dongze He <dhe17@umd.edu> Mohsen Zakeri <mzakeri@cs.umd.edu> Rob Patro <rob@cs.umd.edu> Convert a BAM/SAM file to a RAD file
USAGE: alevin-fry convert --bam <BAMFILE> --threads <THREADS> --output <RADFILE>
OPTIONS: -b, --bam <BAMFILE> input SAM/BAM file -h, --help Print help information -o, --output <RADFILE> output RAD file -t, --threads <THREADS> number of threads to use for processing [default: 8] -V, --version Print version information
